description.p: Farmer is a desktop application that automatically analyzes your git commits to track work activity. It supports multi-repository tracking, AI-powered time entry generation, and cross-platform usage.

ul.li: Git Analysis: Automatically analyze your git commits to track work activity
Multi-Repository Support: Track commits across multiple repositories
AI Integration: Generate time entries and summaries using AI providers
Cross-Platform: Available for macOS, Linux, and Windows
